glsa.title: Cscope: Multiple buffer overflows
glsa.synopsis: Cscope is vulnerable to multiple buffer overflows that could lead to the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: Cscope is a developer's tool for browsing source code.

description.p: Unchecked use of strcpy() and *scanf() leads to several buffer overflows.

impact.p: A user could be enticed to open a carefully crafted file which would allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code with the permissions of the user running Cscope.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Cscope users should upgrade to the latest version:
